name: Plastic Packaging: Sliced Cheese
description:
Video of 3D model featured in PLASTIC AND VIRTUAL PACKAGING: an immersive artwork built in virtual reality.

Mountains of plastic and 3D-generated packaging interrogate our (dis-)connection with reality.

The more plastic packaging, the bigger the satisfaction will be.

More info: https://bruchansky.name/2022/01/18/plastic-and-virtual-packaging/

Royalties will be used to fund further developments of the https://immersions.art platform. With your help, I would like to organise an inaugural virtual exhibition and release an open source library that every artist can use to create their own immersive experiences.
